languages.text: El poder de esta criatura aumenta con la muerte de sus aliados. Cada vez que un aliado muera, la criatura gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}venganza carmesí{/g}.
languages.original_text: The power of this creature grows with the deaths of its allies. Whenever an ally dies, the creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}revenge in crimson{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El poder de esta criatura aumenta con la muerte de sus aliados. Cada vez que un aliado muera, la criatura gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}venganza carmesí{/g}.

languages.text: このクリーチャーのパワーは、味方の死によって増大する。味方が死亡するたび、このクリーチャーは{g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}真紅の復讐{/g}を+1スタック得る。
languages.original_text: The power of this creature grows with the deaths of its allies. Whenever an ally dies, the creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}revenge in crimson{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このクリーチャーのパワーは、味方の死によって増大する。味方が死亡するたび、このクリーチャーは{g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}真紅の復讐{/g}を+1スタック得る。

languages.text: 这种生物会随着盟友死亡而不断变强。每当有盟友死亡时，此生物都会获得1层{g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}血色复仇{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: The power of this creature grows with the deaths of its allies. Whenever an ally dies, the creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}revenge in crimson{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这种生物会随着盟友死亡而不断变强。每当有盟友死亡时，此生物都会获得1层{g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}血色复仇{/g}效果。

languages.text: Die Macht dieser Kreatur wächst mit dem Tod ihrer Verbündeten. Stirbt ein Verbündeter, erhält die Kreatur +1 Stapel {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}Blutrote Vergeltung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The power of this creature grows with the deaths of its allies. Whenever an ally dies, the creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}revenge in crimson{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratığın gücü, dost birimlerinin ölümüyle artar. Yaratık, her dost birimi öldüğünde +1 {g|f:0b96ee4c62f749859db57d06d65c6ffd}kızıl öç{/g} birikimi kazanır.
